contentrichtext.text: '''Harold Brown''' may refer to: *[[Harold Brown (basketball)]] (1923–1980), basketball player *[[Harold P. Brown]], builder of the first electric chair *[[Harold L. Brown]], Pennsylvania politician *[[Harold Brown (Secretary of Defense)]] (born 1927), American physicist, U.S. Secretary of Defense *[[Harold Ray Brown]] (born 1946), member of the 1970s band War *[[Harold Brown (athlete)]] (born 1917) *[[Harold Brown (ice hockey)]] (born 1920) *[[Harold Brown (film preservationist)]] (1919-2008), pioneer in the science of [[film preservation]] ==See also== *[[Harry Brown (disambiguation)]] *[[Harold Browne]], 19th century bishop {{hndis|name=Brown, Harold}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Brown, Harold}}
